attributes.action: Ban the sale of weapons to Saudi Arabia and leave the Saudi led coalition.
attributes.additional_details: For too long the civilians of Yemen have suffered at the hands of the Saudi government, using weapons provided by the U.K. government, whilst the U.K. is also a part of the coalition. The U.K. is Saudis largest arms dealer, and this is causing the loss of thousands of innocent men, women and children’s lives. The coalition is nothing but a way for Saudi to put other Middle Eastern countries down. Saudi must be held accountable for what it has done and the government the power to do so.
attributes.background: Stop selling weapons to Saudi Arabia, a country using them to kill innocent civilians in Yemen. Leave the Saudi coalition, condemn Saudi Arabia’s actions and hold them accountable for their war crimes in the Middle East.
